## Installation

You can install the development version of coriplot from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Dashansh/coriplot")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = time_series_sample_data, aes(x = date), color = cori_blue) +
  geom_line(aes(y = high_school_no_college))+
  geom_line(aes(y = less_than_high_school))+
  scale_color_manual(values=c("#CC6666", "#9999CC"))+
  theme_cori()
  #theme(panel.grid.minor = element_blank())

```
